org.intermine.web.context

Class NullMailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.util.Emailer
      • org.intermine.web.context.NullMailer

  • public class NullMailer
extends Emailer
    An emailer that doesn't send emails, but does log what it has been asked to do.
